dataset_name.description: The name of the dataset to be used.

activation.description: The activation function to be used in the neural network.

number_of_tests.description: Number of tests to be performed.

seed.description: Controls the way to generate random values. If set to True, the same values will be generated in every execution.

subset_percentage.description: Percentage size of the subset of the full dataset.

pruning_method.description: The method to be used for pruning.

method.description: The method to generate new weights in consecutive layers.

mu.description: The mean of a uniform distribution is the midpoint of the interval.

sigma.default: The standard deviation of a uniform distribution is a measure of the spread of the distribution.
